attributes.action: Muslim slogan on house in new south Wales!
attributes.additional_details: We do not want a Muslim slogan on house it is offensive to all non Muslims!

rejection.details: This is potentially for the either the Government Equalities Office in terms of any non devolved considerations about religion as a protected characteristic and for the a devolved matter for the Welsh Government, from a community cohesion angle.  The Wales Office has no responsibilities in this area.
